branchCategory.name: AC - Special Environment
branchCategory.description: <P>The cost effective and clean looking AC series allows you to pick a combination of modular style air preparation equipment that best suits your needs. The series, available in 8 size options to ensure optimum performance, offers energy savings, with higher flow rates. Simple assembly and maintenance reduces downtime.  <FONT color=#ff0000>The current AC series is no longer being produced and is subject to available quantities only.  For size 10 models, please utilize the AC-A series.  For sizes 50~60, please utilize the AC-B series.  For sizes 20~40 please utilize the AC-A or AC-B series as appropriate to your performance and option needs.</FONT></P>

branchItem.name: Metric, North American & European Specifications
branchItem.description: <p class="MsoNormal">The cost effective and clean looking AC series allows you to pick a combination of modular style air preparation equipment that best suits your needs.  The series, available in 8 size options to ensure optimum performance, offers energy savings, with higher flow rates.  Simple assembly and maintenance reduces downtime.  <font color="#ff0000">The current AC series is no longer being produced and is subject to available quantities only.  For size 10 models, please utilize the AC-A series.  For sizes 50~60, please utilize the AC-B series.  For sizes 20~40, please utilize the AC-A or AC-B series as appropriate to your performance and option needs.<o:p></o:p></font></p>

branchItem.name: Accessories/Attachments
branchItem.description: <p class="MsoNormal">Several additional products are available to complete the air preparation installation.  These include:  modular spacers for adding additional components; pressure relief valves for quickly relieving system pressure for service; soft start valves for controlled system pressurization; check valves; T- or cross spacers allow air access at intermediate points in the assembly; pressure switches for electrical confirmation of system pressure; and piping adapters for maintenance ease. <font color="#ff0000"> The current AC series is no longer being produced and is subject to available quantities only.  For size 10 models, please utilize the AC-A series.  For sizes 50~60, please utilize the AC-B series.  For sizes 20~40, please utilize the AC-A or AC-B series as appropriate to your performance and option needs.<o:p></o:p></font></p>
